sub_topic: Solving systems of linear equations using iterative methods
message_1:
Solve the system of linear equations using the Jacobi iterative method:

\begin{align*}
2x + 3y - z &= 7 \\
3x - 4y + z &= -12 \\
-x + y + 5z &= 15
\end{align*}

Use the initial guesses $x_0 = 0$, $y_0 = 0$, and $z_0 = 0$. Perform five iterations and report your final solution with a tolerance of $\epsilon = 0.001$.
